Name: An empty basket opens in your account when you click on it

Steps_to_reproduce_the_error.Fourth_step: Click in the upper right corner on the basket

Actual_result: The product selected from the 'Smartphones and Gadgets' section was not added to the cart of the user's personal account
Expected_Result: The product selected from the 'Smartphones and Gadgets' section is added to the basket of the user's personal account
